verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3050><s%> Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> for he is good, <S%H2896><s%> for his loving kindness <S%H2896><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Who can utter <S%H4448><s%> the mighty acts <S%H1369><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> or fully declare <S%H8085><s%> all his praise? <S%H8416><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are those who keep <S%H8104><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%> Blessed is one who does <S%H6213><s%> what is right <S%H6666><s%> at all times. <S%H6256><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, with the favor <S%H7522><s%> that you show to your people. <S%H5971><s%> Visit <S%H6485><s%> me with your salvation, <S%H3444><s%>

that I may see <S%H7200><s%> the prosperity <S%H2896><s%> of your chosen, <S%H972><s%> that I may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the gladness <S%H8057><s%> of your nation, <S%H1471><s%> that I may glory <S%H1984><s%> with your inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> with our fathers. <S%H1><s%> We have committed iniquity. <S%H5753><s%> We have done wickedly. <S%H7561><s%>

Our fathers <S%H1><s%> didn't <S%H7919><s%> understand your wonders <S%H6381><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> They didn't <S%H2142><s%> remember the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your loving kindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> but were rebellious <S%H4784><s%> at the sea, <S%H3220><s%> even at the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>
Nevertheless he saved <S%H3467><s%> them for his name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H1369><s%> that he might make his mighty power known. <S%H3045><s%>

He rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> also, <S%H2717><s%> and it was dried up; so he led <S%H3212><s%> them through the depths, <S%H8415><s%> as through a desert. <S%H4057><s%>
He saved <S%H3467><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him who hated <S%H8130><s%> them, <S%H1350><s%> and redeemed them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>
The waters <S%H4325><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> their adversaries. <S%H6862><s%> There was not one <S%H259><s%> of them left. <S%H3498><s%>
Then they believed <S%H539><s%> his words. <S%H1697><s%> They sang <S%H7891><s%> his praise. <S%H8416><s%>
They soon <S%H4116><s%> forgot <S%H7911><s%> his works. <S%H4639><s%> They didn't <S%H2442><s%> wait for his counsel, <S%H6098><s%>
but gave <S%H8378><s%> in to craving <S%H183><s%> in the desert, <S%H4057><s%> and tested <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in the wasteland. <S%H3452><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them their request, <S%H7596><s%> but sent <S%H7971><s%> leanness <S%H7332><s%> into their soul. <S%H5315><s%>
They envied <S%H7065><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s saint. <S%H6918><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> and swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of Abiram. <S%H48><s%>
A fire <S%H784><s%> was kindled <S%H1197><s%> in their company. <S%H5712><s%> The flame <S%H3852><s%> burned up <S%H3857><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> a calf <S%H5695><s%> in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> a molten image. <S%H4541><s%>
Thus they exchanged <S%H4171><s%> their glory <S%H3519><s%> for an image <S%H8403><s%> of a bull <S%H7794><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> grass. <S%H6212><s%>
They forgot <S%H7911><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> their Savior, <S%H3467><s%> who had done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>
Wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and awesome things <S%H3372><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore he said <S%H559><s%> that he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H4872><s%> had Moses, his chosen, <S%H972><s%> not <S%H3884><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him in the breach, <S%H6556><s%> to turn away <S%H7725><s%> his wrath, <S%H2534><s%> so that he wouldn't <S%H7843><s%> destroy them.
Yes, <S%H3988><s%> they despised the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land. <S%H776><s%> They didn't <S%H539><s%> believe his word, <S%H1697><s%>
but murmured <S%H7279><s%> in their tents, <S%H168><s%> and didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice. <S%H6963><s%>
Therefore he swore <S%H5375><s%> to <S%H3027><s%> them that he would overthrow <S%H5307><s%> them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%>
that he would overthrow <S%H5307><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and scatter <S%H2219><s%> them in the lands. <S%H776><s%>
They joined <S%H6775><s%> themselves also to Baal <S%H1187><s%> Peor, <S%H398><s%> and ate the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Thus they provoked him to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their deeds. <S%H4611><s%> The plague <S%H4046><s%> broke in on them. <S%H6555><s%>
Then Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> stood up, <S%H5975><s%> and executed judgment, <S%H6419><s%> so the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stopped. <S%H6113><s%>
That was credited <S%H2803><s%> to him for righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> for all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> come. <S%H5769><s%>
They angered <S%H7107><s%> him also at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah, <S%H4808><s%> so that Moses <S%H4872><s%> was troubled for their sakes; <S%H3415><s%>
because they were rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> he spoke rashly <S%H981><s%> with his lips. <S%H8193><s%>
They didn't <S%H8045><s%> destroy the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded them, <S%H559><s%>
but mixed <S%H6148><s%> themselves with the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and learned <S%H3925><s%> their works. <S%H4639><s%>
They served <S%H5647><s%> their idols, <S%H6091><s%> which became a snare to them. <S%H4170><s%>
Yes, <S%H2076><s%> they sacrificed their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to demons. <S%H7700><s%>

They shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> even the blood <S%H1818><s%> of their sons <S%H1121><s%> and of their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to the idols <S%H6091><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> was polluted <S%H2610><s%> with blood. <S%H1818><s%>
Thus were they defiled <S%H2930><s%> with their works, <S%H4639><s%> and prostituted <S%H2181><s%> themselves in their deeds. <S%H4639><s%>
Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> with anger <S%H639><s%> against his people. <S%H5971><s%> He abhorred <S%H8581><s%> his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> Those who hated <S%H8130><s%> them ruled over them. <S%H4910><s%>
Their enemies <S%H341><s%> also oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them. <S%H3665><s%> They were brought into subjection under their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> he delivered <S%H5337><s%> them, <S%H4784><s%> but they were rebellious in their counsel, <S%H6098><s%> and were brought low <S%H4355><s%> in their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
Nevertheless he regarded <S%H7200><s%> their distress, <S%H6862><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry. <S%H7440><s%>
He remembered <S%H2142><s%> for them his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and repented <S%H5162><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his loving kindnesses. <S%H2617><s%>
He made <S%H5414><s%> them also to be pitied <S%H7356><s%> by <S%H6440><s%> all those who carried them captive. <S%H7617><s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> us, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, our God, <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> us from among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to your holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> to triumph <S%H7623><s%> in your praise! <S%H8416><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> BOOK be V Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> even to everlasting! <S%H5769><s%> Let all the people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Amen. <S%H543><s%>" Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
